choose_credential_tip.message: Choose own credential fields for this page

register_pair_tip.message: KeePassHttp-Connector has not been configured. Press the connect button to register and pair with KeePassHttp.

disconnected_tip.message: KeePassHttp-Connector has been disconnected from KeePassHttp.

press_reconnect_tip.message: Press the reconnect button to establish a new connection.

connect_success_tip.message: KeePassHttp-Connector has been configured using the identifier "" and is successfully connected to KeePassHttp

old_version_tip.message: You use an old version of KeePassHttp.

select_login_info_tip.message: Select the login information you would like to get logged in with:

select_login_info_enter_tip.message: Select the login information you would like to get entered into the page:

more_password_right_click_tip.message: KeePassHttp-Connector found more than one password field on this page. To enter your logins, right-click on one of the password fields, and choose either the "Fill User + Pass" or "Fill Pass Only" command.

entry_changed_save_tip.message: Username or password changed! Save it?

credentials_will_save_tip.message: Credentials will be saved in connected database with identifier .

username_currently_not_save_tip.message: The used username is currently not saved!

credential_marked_bold_tip.message: The credentials with the used username are marked bold.

choose_credential_update_tip.message: Please choose the credentials you want to update:

fill_intro_tip.message:
If you just want to insert username + password into the fields where your focus is, press Ctrl + Shift + U.
If you only want to insert the password, just press Alt + Shift + P. You can customize these shortcuts on chrome://extensions/configureCommands page.

maxium_icon_blink_when_new_credentials.message:
What is the maximum time (ms) the icon should blink after detecting new credentials
Default: 7500

minimum_icon_blink_before_deactivating.message:
What is the minimum time (ms) the icon should blink before deactivating due to page redirects.
-1 to only use Blink Time ignoring Redirect Allowance (old behavior)
Default: -1, Recommended: 2000

num_page_cycle_after_redirect.message:
How many pages should the tab cycle through after the redirect offset before deactivating the icon
Default: 1

generate_icon_in_password_field_tip.message:
For all password-fields there will be an icon added to generate a new password.
It is generated by KeePass with the profile for automatically generated passwords for new entries.

retrieve_credentials_when_tab_active_tip.message: KeePassHttp-Connector will immediately retrieve the credentials when the tab is activated.

auto_fill_single_credential_entry_intro_.message: If KeePassHttp-Connector does only receive a single entry from KeePassHttp it automatically fills this credentials into the found credential fields.

active_autocomplete_username_intro.message: For all username fields on a page a dropdown list appears which contains all available credentials.
